Resume

Summary

Results-focused data professional with a track record of driving business growth through data science, engineering, and machine learning. Skilled in developing ETL processes, building data pipelines, conducting A/B tests, and leveraging data science techniques for actionable insights. Proficient in SQL, Python, dbt, Azure, and data visualization tools, with expertise in analyzing complex datasets. Holds an M.S. in Data Science. Passionate about bridging engineering and analytics to create impactful solutions and optimize business performance.
